# The `SCEVParameterRewriter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevparameterrewriter">SCEVParameterRewriter</a> takes a scalar evolution expression and updates the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevunknown">SCEVUnknown</a> components following the Map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevparameterrewriter">SCEVParameterRewriter</a> takes a scalar evolution expression and updates the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevunknown">SCEVUnknown</a> components following the Map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>).
